website_summaries.verdict: Beautiful laptop case for those who like to travel in style but want added protection.
pros: Comes with a separate case for the power cord
Heavy-duty zipper on both cases holds tight and keeps laptop secure
cons: May have a slight odor that quickly fades when aired out

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover, Additional Small Cover is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice cover. It fits my 13' MacBook Pro very well, and it's very soft inside. If I didn't have a case, I wouldn't be at all concerned with the lining potentially scratching. The canvas is a nice quality, and the little case it comes with it awesome. It fit my external hard drive, battery pack, or power adapter perfectly. Love that!
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Didn't feel or smell very pleasant.
customer_reviews.text: Returned it as chemical smell didn't go away after a weekend. I needed it for a trip and didn't want to risk it packing it with my clothes. Inside was soft and the smaller pouch was nice as it unzipped all the way to ends rather than halfway down sides. It had same soft light gray lining. Canvas feels very rough and harsh, imho. Design was a nice dark black/white however, just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Bobblefrog

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price
customer_reviews.text: This is cute, I like the soft inner lining, and I like that it comes with the small bag for charging chord and accessories. It's a little bit of a snug fit for my MacBook Air's chord (it has a big rectangle part) with a few thumb drives in it, but it all fits.
customer_reviews.author: T. Reed

customer_reviews.title: This case is the perfect solution to that
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Wacom Intuos drawing tablet, its the right fit. The pouch is helpful in order to put my pen and pen stand along with my charger. I use to have these objects share a space but noticed my tablet surface was getting scratched slightly. This case is the perfect solution to that. The design is also really cute. Will order more in the future because I like customizing products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Pattern
customer_reviews.text: Cute pattern. Sleeve is a bit large for my Surface laptop and it doesn't offer a lot of protection if dropped. Mostly purchased to protect it from getting scratched in my work bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried the water resistant feature but everything else is wonderful. I love the design and the inside is perfect for my MacBook Air. Protects my laptop perfect and I love the quality. Great case for a good price. The smaller accessory pouch is nice too and just the same high quality as the laptop pouch. Definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: yasmine

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It gits perfectly for my macbook air! It has a little bit of space on each sides, enough to grab out and place in. It is amazing quality, and it coming with the charging cover was a plus! Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Anjali

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, in particular the ones that said the color was off or it looked dusty when I received it, I wasn't sure what I was going to get. But I thought for the price it would be worth the risk. I am so glad I ordered this product. The black/white color is great and there was no dust to be found. Quality is great. and i love the small case too. I have an HP Elite book. 13.5". It fits my laptop perfectly. I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BAC

customer_reviews.title: 13-13.3 is perfect for MacBook Air Model A1466
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid the internal measurement would be a little too wide for my MacBook Air A1466 model but it’s a perfect fit. I love how slime the profile is. The internal padding is nice and plush, great since I will always be carrying it in another bag. The smaller accessory bag will be great for the charger and ear buds! Love the black! The pattern is a nice cream canvas tone and not bright white. Not 100% waterproof, that’s why I gave that part of the review a 4.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Padded sleeve for 13 inch laptop or larger tablet
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful lightly padded sleeve for 13 inch laptop and bonus side pouch. Cute graphic, smooth zipper. I use inside of a larger work tote bag to protect a Microsoft Surface Pro 2017.
customer_reviews.author: S. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Love the protection.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed these laptop caes. I was really worried when I first got my MacBook that I was going to scratch the whole thing up but these came in handy. I use them anytime I take my computer somewhere and I even use the smaller pouch to put my mouse and charger in. It is so convenient I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: and she was very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover for my daughter, and she was very pleased with it. She liked the fabric it’s made of, the accessory pouch for her charger and earphones, and how she can put the pouch inside the case.👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I like the print, it fits my Mac Air well. Nicely cushioned without being bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryll Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and the mini bag is useful to carry adapters and usb’s if I need to
customer_reviews.author: alli

customer_reviews.title: Very quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little big for my laptop (MACBOOK Air 2018) but I don’t mind it...overall good product
customer_reviews.author: jane frances

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my needs perfectly. The canvas is nicer then I expected. The pouch is a bonus that I’m using more than initially thought I would as well.
customer_reviews.author: W8KBRDR

customer_reviews.title: It is super light and sleek
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute case to carry my MacBook in to work. It is super light and sleek. My laptop doesn't get all dirty, scratched up, and have random bobby pins attached to it by the time I go to work so that gives it an A+ for me :)
customer_reviews.author: Tori Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Laptop case
customer_reviews.text: Really well made. Good material. Zipper sturdy. Really good customer service. They sent an follow-up email to see if everything was okay. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: murga

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, good looking and very functional
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded my expectations. Perfect fit for my hp 13" pavilion. Looks great, and the extra carrying case for the charger is brilliant. Excellent product for the price. Durable and classy.
customer_reviews.author: RJL

customer_reviews.title: The smaller pouch is great for accessories
customer_reviews.text: Both cases are lined and provide protection. The smaller pouch is great for accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Csmiles24

customer_reviews.title: This a necessity !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this water resistant sleeve for my Mac (2015 version) to protect and it is perfect & super fashionable ;). Really thin & light...the sleeve is made well; no awkward stitching & the mini sleeve for the charger is a plus!!! This is hands down a must buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Peralta

customer_reviews.title: NOPE
customer_reviews.text: The black material fades very quickly and looks old. My case looks light grey and white. Very cheap material; would no recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paresha

customer_reviews.title: good protection for my
customer_reviews.text: Really padded and soft inside, good protection for my laptop
customer_reviews.author: tabes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: ... even better in person than online. And I love that the two pouches came as a set.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy C

customer_reviews.title: Case is too big for MacBook 13 inch w touch ...
customer_reviews.text: Case is too big for MacBook 13 inch w touch bar, has quickly dissipating odor, has a very soft interior.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop case. It fits my chrome book nicely. It’s a bit bigger then my chrome book, but I like that it has a little room. Also the charger case is perfect and works well for my laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis L.

customer_reviews.title: Really great sleeve for my laptop
customer_reviews.text: Really great sleeve for my laptop. The inside is super soft so I feel that my laptop is protected. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! Well made and it fit my MacBook perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it and uses it for her Macbook
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Murch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is the cutest case, i got it for a 13 inch computer and fits really nice
customer_reviews.author: Ana Mena

customer_reviews.title: I like the case alot
customer_reviews.text: I like the case alot. The fit is not as snug as I would have liked on my Macbook Pro with Retina display but it still protects my laptop very well and I love the modern design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to protect my work laptop and accessories while traveling
customer_reviews.author: Dana C Marcoux

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute! Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Super Cute! Love the separate pouch for the charging cords. Wish it had a handle :( other than that it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Emilia Booker

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. The material is quiet bad and I was charged 90% of the cost for returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaydulft

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly!! I use it for my work laptop/mouse.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Durable material and thick cover! Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great feel, and it fits the MacBook Pro with ...
customer_reviews.text: Product looks exactly how it does in the picture! Great feel, and it fits the MacBook Pro with CD perfectly! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Rhea Philip

customer_reviews.title: Love the design and how soft the inside is
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and how soft the inside is. I especially apprecige the case for the charger. Didn't reali how important it was until I had one. I will def be buying Mosiso products again. This is a great laptop bag!
customer_reviews.author: Madelynn Reyes

customer_reviews.title: This item smells so bad, I had to leave it in the sun ...
customer_reviews.text: This item smells so bad, I had to leave it in the sun for a while and put perfume on it, but still smelled like strong plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product to hold my Ultrabook. Very padded and the black and white pattern is so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Candiotti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little case at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for storing my little MacBook cute design and I also like the little case for my charger and earbuds!!
customer_reviews.author: angela peacock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sleeve. It has thick, quality material. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... cheap but it is waterproof and it is extremely useful
customer_reviews.text: It looks very cheap but it is waterproof and it is extremely useful
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Regalado

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Much nicer than I anticipated for the price
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! Much nicer than I anticipated for the price. Super soft, padded interior so it won't scratch my laptop. Fits a MacBook Air perfectly. Love the separate case for the charger too!
customer_reviews.author: jenuinejewel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter, who is a sophomore in college. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Don’t hesutate to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sfmom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I expected! Sturdy zipper and good protection!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great lap top cover!
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect. It came quickly. The fabric is just what I was expecting. The quality is great. I would buy another one & recommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the pattern land the size is perfect for my ...
customer_reviews.text: It has a factory odor,..but disappeared after a week. Love the pattern land the size is perfect for my Mac Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my case! It arrived quickly and it is great quality!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Griffith
